plot: The graduating class of the local high school is going on a luxury cruise with Jason Voorhees as a stowaway. The heroine Rennie Wickham believes she was almost drowned by Jason as a child. Jason eventually sinks the boat and kills many of the students on it, but many of them escape to Manhattan. A long battle with Jason ensues until Jason is washed away in the New York sewers by a midnight flooding of toxic waste.

f.role: Tamara, who had pushed poor Rennie into the water just because she saw her doing drugs {And didn't even rat her out either}, ends up getting stabbed by Jason with several glass shards.

Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan: Rennie, who stabs Jason in the eye the first time he attacks her (which is actually quite impressive by the standards of Jason's victims) and melts his face with toxic sludge.

similar.name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood

name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
